price: Allah ermahnt euch, niemals wieder dergleichen zu tun, wenn ihr gläubig seid.
arabic: يَعِظُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَن تَعُودُواْ لِمِثۡلِهِۦٓ أَبَدًا إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: yaʿiẓukumu al-lahu an taʿūdū limith'lihi abadan in kuntum mu'minīna
